channel.title: Attempt at booleans, i know its completely wrong, could someone show me how 2fix

item.title: Attempt at booleans, i know its completely wrong, could someone show me how 2fix
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

I’ve fixed it up to pretty much what you got but so it works(as far as I know, haven’t tested), however you should download SRL and take a look at that. ClickMouse is so detectable in RS2.

procedure RightClicking; var xs, ys, xe, ye : Integer; begin xs := 3; ys := 60; xe := 508; ye := 351; if (FindColor(x, y, orecolor, xs, ys, xe, ye)) then begin WriteLn('Found orecolor'); Wait(delay + Random(50)); ClickMouse(x, y, False); end else if (FindColor(x, y, orecolor2, xs, ys, xe, ye)) then begin WriteLn('Found orecolor2'); Wait(delay + Random(50)); ClickMouse(x, y, False); end else if (FindColor(x, y, orecolor3, xs, ys, xe, ye)) then begin WriteLn('Found orecolor3'); Wait(delay + Random(50)); ClickMouse(x, y, False); end; end;

Read full topic
item.source: Attempt at booleans, i know its completely wrong, could someone show me how 2fix

item.title: Attempt at booleans, i know its completely wrong, could someone show me how 2fix
item.dc:creator: @fook fook
item.description:
@fook wrote:

ok i made this code 2 scan for 3 colors onscreen, if the first color wasnt found the boolean would return false and go 2 the next step of finding color which uses the same method, i tryed to make it so that if it returned true it would continue on the loop… its hard to explane, look at the code you’ll understand what i tryed to do :D. anyway i got compile errors because ive never used booleans before, i was hoping someone could rewrite it so that it works so i can learn from it. heres the code i wrote… dont laugh i know its probably completely fucked

procedure rightclicking; begin If((findcolor(x,y,orecolor,3,60,508,351)))then a = true; If(not(findcolor(x,y,orecolor,3,60,508,351)))then a = false; begin If(a = true)then writeln('found orecolor1'); wait(delay+random(50)); clickmouse(x,y,false); end; begin If(a = false)then begin if((findcolor(x,y,orecolor2,3,60,508,351)))then b = true; If(not(findcolor(x,y,orecolor2,3,60,508,351)))then b = false; begin If(b = true)then writeln('found orecolor2'); wait(delay+random(50)); clickmouse(x,y,false); end; begin if(b = false)then begin if((findcolor(x,y,orecolor3,3,60,508,351)))then c = true; If(not(findcolor(x,y,orecolor3,3,60,508,351)))then c = false; begin If(c = true)then writeln('found orecolor3'); wait(delay+random(50)); clickmouse(x,y,false); end; begin if(c = false)then repeat until(c=true) end; end; end; end;

Read full topic
